page.shortlink: gridproperties miscellaneous date picker day names property
page.description: Specify the names of the days of the week to be shown when the pop-up date picker is used.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Date picker - day names]* property can be used to define the text shown in the date picker for the days of the week. This first entry in list must be Sunday (even if you set the 'first day of the week' property to another day. Enter a comma separated list.
You can also set the day names in this special session variable:
This session variable can be used to translate the date names to another language.

description.p: You can also specify that the date names should be dynamically computed based on the user's locale by setting the *[ui:Date picker - day names]* property to <cultureDayNames>.

see.ref: Setting the Date Format Based on the User's Locale
